attributes.action: Allow Gurkha Hero Tul Bahadur Pun VC and his Gurkha Comrades Unrestricted Rights to Live in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gurkha solidiers have fought and died for Britain for 200 years. These soldiers are described as the "bravest of the brave".

However, Gurkhas who retired before 1997, including a Victoria Cross winner, Tul Bahadur Pun VC, are being refused rights to settle in the United Kingdom.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
